features.additionalInfo: Your loan comes with a repayment redraw facility. This gives you access to additional repayments if you   re at least one full repayment ahead, you can redraw $100 or more. It   s simple to redraw using our App or Online Banking.
Get faster payments between participating banks, anytime with Pay ID

Maximum 12 months. For bridging loans with a continuing debt following the sale of one property, loan to be reviewed on receipt of the sale proceeds to structure the continuing debt. All product options available at that time may be considered.
You can make extra repayments or repay your loan in full at any time. Extra repayments may enable you to redraw funds, subject to conditions

If you will have a continuing debt after selling one property, the maximum LVR is 75% during the bridging period. If loan will be fully repaid after the sale of one property, the maximum LVR is 50% during the bridging period.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Individuals must have the legal capacity to enter into the loan contract, provide acceptable identification documentation and be 18 years or older
You must be an Australian citizen or permanent resident to apply
Applications for credit are subject to the Bank   s eligibility and suitability criteria and normal credit approval process.

fees.name: LOAN_ESTABLISHMENT_FEE_-_MORTGAGE_LOAN_(NEW)
fees.additionalInfo: A fee charged to set up a new home loan

fees.name: LOAN_ESTABLISHMENT_FEE_-_MORTGAGE_LOAN_(TOP_UP)
fees.additionalInfo: A fee charged to vary the value of an existing home loan

fees.name: LOAN_ESTABLISHMENT_FEE_-_SECOND_MORTGAGE_LOAN_(NEW)
fees.additionalInfo: A fee charged for consent to a subsequent new mortgage

fees.name: LOAN_ESTABLISHMENT_FEE_-_SECOND_MORTGAGE_LOAN_(TOP_UP)
fees.additionalInfo: A fee charged for consent to a subsequent mortgage to vary the value of an existing home loan

fees.name: LOAN_SWITCH_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: A fee charged to switch your loan account from one type to another

fees.name: VALUATION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: A fee charged to cover the cost of obtaining a valuation report on your property or the property being purchased

fees.name: MORTGAGE_PREPARATION_FEES
fees.additionalInfo: A fee charged for legal services including preparation of legal documents and attending settlement

fees.name: TITLE_SEARCH_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: A third party cost for a Title Search to determine any interests in a property

fees.name: REGISTRATION_FEES
fees.additionalInfo: A third party cost for registration of mortgage

fees.name: STAMP_DUTY_(MORTGAGE)
fees.additionalInfo: The tax charged on written documents and certain transactions imposed by the state government, such as mortgages and property transfers

fees.name: PEXA_SERVICE_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: A fee charged to cover third party costs associated with the establishment of your mortgage

fees.name: LENDERS_MORTGAGE_INSURANCE
fees.additionalInfo: Third party cost for insurance that protects the lender in the event that the borrower defaults on their home or investment loan

fees.name: MORTGAGE_ADMINISTRATION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: A fee charged if we are asked by you or your legal representative to make any of our loan documents available to you during the life of the loan

fees.name: CONSENT_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: A fee charged for consent to a subsequent mortgage in favour of an another lender where we hold the prior mortgage

fees.name: MORTGAGE_DISCHARGE_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: A fee charged if you repay your loan and request us to discharge your mortgage, includes our costs and is in addition to any costs incurred by us from external parties

fees.name: MORTGAGE_DISCHARGE_-_REGISTRATION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: A fee charged to cover third party costs associated with the discharge of your mortgage

fees.name: MORTGAGE_DISCHARGE_-_PEXA_SERVICE_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: A fee charged to cover third party costs associated with the discharge of your mortgage

fees.name: VARIATION_OF_SECURITY
fees.additionalInfo: A fee charged for the variation of security or other loan details, requiring us to issue new documents or re-assess your loan in any way

fees.name: MORTGAGE_REDRAW_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: A fee charged to access the redraw facility on your home loan

fees.name: LATE_PAYMENT_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: A fee charged when you don't make your minimum monthly payment, plus any overdue amount

fees.name: DEFAULT_NOTICE_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: A fee charged if you default on your repayments and we issue a default notice

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Comparison rate based on $150,000 loan over 25 years. WARNING: This comparison rate is true only for the examples given and may not include all fees and charges. Different terms, fees or other loan amounts might result in a different comparison rate.

data.name: INV Bridging Loan Variable Rate I/O Var 12 mths
data.description: This loan helps bridge the gap for up to 12 months, providing the funds you need to buy your new home before your current property is sold.
